    • Constructor Detail

      • Bulb

        public Bulb(java.lang.String ip)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a Bulb object used to connect to and control a Xiaomi (Yeelight) Light Bulb.
        Parameters:
        ip - ip address of light bulb.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if TCP connection to light bulb can not be established.

    • Method Detail

      • discover

        public static java.util.Collection<Bulb> discover(int timeout)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Every bulb listens on multi-cast address waiting for any incoming search requests. This method sends an UDP request to that address and if any bulb receives the request it will uni-cast an UDP response to the searcher. Information on the UDP reply is parsed to Bulb class. At last TCP connection is configured in order to later send TCP control packets.
        Parameters:
        timeout - amount of time to wait for any UDP response on multi-cast address.
        Returns:
        every bulb discovered on the network.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if UDP or TCP connection can not be established.

      • runMethod

        public void runMethod(java.lang.String method,
                      java.lang.Object[] params)
        Generates the JSON format command holding method and parameters. After sends it to Bulb socket over TCP.
        Parameters:
        method - method that will be applied to Bulb.
        params - method's parameters.
